entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reenable EventLogsPipeUnitTests and EventCounterTriggerTests #2568
    6.0.0

Closed

  • dotnet-trace/dotnet-counters leaves Unix Domain Socket file on ctrl-c, preventing restart when using --diagnostic-port. #2426
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Disabling EventLogsPipeUnitTests.TestLogsWildcardCategory and EventCounterTriggerTests.EventCounterTriggerWithEventPipePipelineTest #2569
    auto-merge
  • In dotnet-trace/counters disposed of the server when we received ctrl+C while waiting for clients to connect. closes #2426 #2476
    dotnet-trace, dotnet-counters, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Enable crash dump report generation in SOS tests #2558
  • altered dotnet-counters to work with inputRedirection #2329 #2466
    dotnet-counters, 6.0.0
